text.font-family: ui-sans-serif, system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, Arial

svg.text: plan-first workflow • HOTFormerLoc edge deployment • profile + gate

g.font-family: ui-monospace, SFMono-Regular, Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, 'Liberation Mono', 'Courier New', monospace

text.tspan: > Plan edge deployment (no code yet). Include constraints, profiling, acceptance criteria. Cite files.
1) Confirm target constraints: device, FPS/latency, power, RAM/VRAM, accuracy metric
2) Add deterministic benchmark script (e.g., misc/edge_bench.py) for p50/p95 + peak memory
3) Instrument eval/pnv_evaluate.py to separate preproc vs forward vs postproc
4) Add safe toggles for AMP/FP16 inference (A/B compare) and measure
5) Prototype export path (TorchScript/ONNX) and an edge runtime (TensorRT/ORT)
6) Define an accuracy gate on a fixed subset (e.g., recall@1 delta ≤ threshold)
• run baseline + optimized builds on the target device (log p50/p95 latency + GPU memory)
• run accuracy eval on a fixed subset; assert recall drop stays within the agreed threshold
• export may be blocked by custom ops (mitigate: PyTorch + AMP; or write export-friendly kernels)
• preproc becomes dominant on edge CPU (mitigate: simplify octree build; batch; pin memory)
changes are additive + flag-gated; revert one commit if needed
